author: bruno
msg: Add a locale attribute on the <form> tag so that client-side scripts can know the locale used to render/parse the form data (used by the dojo-based datetime picker)

author: bruno
msg: * Add dojo-based date / time / datetime pickers (previously only a date picker was supported)
* Make resources-uri available to client-side javascript by setting it as a property on the cocoon object
* Configure djConfig.extraLocale to make some extra locales available to dojo

author: gturrell
msg: WODEN-53 Created unit tests for API methods of woden wsdl20 ElementDeclaration, TypeDefinition and TypesElement.

author: djencks
msg: GERONIMO-2732 use correct environment for configId when constructing server side gbean name
